author: Simon Woodington

text: That's right. This track is the work of the duo "Haruo Ohashi" and "Hiroyuki Iwatsuki". Both composers worked on this game, Ninja Warriors Again, GS Mikami Joreishi Ha Nice Body, Power Rangers the Movie, and Gekisou Sentai Carranger.
